channel.title: Browser-based game "Medieval Conquest Online"
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/userzVE.jpg[/img][/center]
Our ideas [I]so far[/I]:
[ul][li]Start off as a peasant in a unnamed kingdom with one acre of farm land and 1,000 turns[/li] [li]Obtain a turn every 1-5 minutes (depending on your rank)[/li] [li]The higher your rank, the slower you will obtain a turn[/li] [li]Each "turn" you will be able to do a number of things including (as a peasant):[/li] [list] [li]Expand farm by an acre[/li] [li]Steal from general store[/li] [li]Steal from other peasants (people)[/li] [/list] [li]Somehow, (not quite figured it out yet) rank up to knight or guard and eventually king servant[/li] [li]Able to create guilds[/li] [li]When you are a "kings servant" you are able to try and overthrow the current king[/li] [li]As different ranks, you can do different abilities per turn[/li] [li]As king you can name the kingdom[/li] [li]You are not able to join (or be in) a guild as the king[/li][/ul]
Ranks so far (may change):
[ul][li]Peasant (start)[/li] [li]Knight[/li] [li]Kings Guard[/li] [li]Kings Servant (top 10 kings guards?)[/li] [li]King (last)[/li][/ul]
Update log: [code] [4/11/13] You can now resend the verification link. [4/10/13] Verification function finished. [4/10/13] Registration form created. [4/10/13] Login form created. [4/10/13] Home page designed. [4/10/13] Banner created. [/code]
Please post your ideas and constructive criticism :).

If you’d like to join this project, feel free to send me a PM. You must have knowledge of PHP, MySQL and HTML5 or you could always just be a graphics designer.

item.title: Browser-based game "Medieval Conquest Online"
item.dc:creator: @XxJtxX XxJtxX
item.description:
@XxJtxX wrote:

[center]

userzVE.jpg1000×400
[/center]

Our ideas so far:

[ul][li]Start off as a peasant in a unnamed kingdom with one acre of farm land and 1,000 turns[/li]
[li]Obtain a turn every 1-5 minutes (depending on your rank)[/li]
[li]The higher your rank, the slower you will obtain a turn[/li]
[li]Each “turn” you will be able to do a number of things including (as a peasant):[/li]
[list]
[li]Expand farm by an acre[/li]
[li]Steal from general store[/li]
[li]Steal from other peasants (people)[/li]
[/list]
[li]Somehow, (not quite figured it out yet) rank up to knight or guard and eventually king servant[/li]
[li]Able to create guilds[/li]
[li]When you are a “kings servant” you are able to try and overthrow the current king[/li]
[li]As different ranks, you can do different abilities per turn[/li]
[li]As king you can name the kingdom[/li]
[li]You are not able to join (or be in) a guild as the king[/li][/ul]

Ranks so far (may change):

[ul][li]Peasant (start)[/li]
[li]Knight[/li]
[li]Kings Guard[/li]
[li]Kings Servant (top 10 kings guards?)[/li]
[li]King (last)[/li][/ul]

Update log:

[4/11/13] You can now resend the verification link.
[4/10/13] Verification function finished.
[4/10/13] Registration form created.
[4/10/13] Login form created.
[4/10/13] Home page designed.
[4/10/13] Banner created.

Please post your ideas and constructive criticism :).

Read full topic
